entry.title: HTLC Endorsement for Jamming Mitigation
entry.summary: In a discussion thread, a user expresses interest in writing an extension and deploying it to some nodes using an implementation like CLN. They offer to help with implementation details. Another user suggests creating an experimental data gathering mechanism for CLN and proposes using lnmetrics as a platform. They plan to follow up when data collection begins. The original user also mentions planning a machine learning post about lnmetrics and is open to discussing the necessary data to gather from the network.
